item.title: Daily Update on My Journey to Get SWE Job
item.description: In this post I will write my daily progress to get a job or internship as software engineer (backend). Day 1 Friday, 10 June 2022 DSA : review big O notation from Cracking Coding Interview Book learning : learn java from jetbrains academy learn git and github from udemy course project : start exploring for my first mini project job search : update my CV

item.title: Build Static Website With Hugo and Github Pages
item.description: introduction A static website is one with stable content where every user sees the exact same thing on each individual page. There are tools to build static website, such as wordpress, hugo, jekyll, etc. In this tutorial i want to explain how to use Hugo to build static website. After you build the static website, you need to host it online. There are many services that help you to host your website online, either paid or free, such as netlify, github pages, heroku, etc.

About me CV | Linkedin | Github | HackerRank | Youtube My name is Wanda Yusuf Alvian (nickname : Yusuf) and I am a self taught programmer. Even though I claimed myself as self taught, i have been enrolled in CS Graduate Program University of Gadjah Mada to learn fundamental of CS. I enjoy my learning experience there and finish 41 credits with 3.95 GPA, but without a degree because i didn’t finish my thesis.
